attributes.action: We need stronger climate plans, now!
attributes.additional_details:
The government’s own climate advisors said its existing climate plans aren’t good enough – with less than one in five of its planned emissions cuts being credible.

Now Prime Minister Sunak says he wants to weaken them further.

We need bold ambition and credible proposals – not more backtracking that will leave us lagging further behind in the race to build a modern green economy.
attributes.background: Please deliver the practical actions needed, including on homes, transport, and energy needed to avoid climate breakdown.

rejection.details:
We understand that you want to see more actions to tackle climate change, but we're not exactly sure what actions you'd like to see. We could accept a petition that called for a specific action to be taken. For example, we've published the following petitions which you may wish to sign:

Keep the promise to ban diesel and petrol cars in 2030: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644662

Stop all new oil and gas developments: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640606
